SEARCH
Package AntWorld

Class Vertex

java.lang.Object
AntWorld.Vertex
Direct Known Subclasses:
Anthill, Leaf, Stone
public class Vertex extends Object
This class represents a vertex in the ant world. It contains lists of red and blue ants, a list of neighboring vertices, and attributes for the number of larvae, name, and location. It also contains a semaphore for thread synchronization.

  • Constructor Details

    • Vertex

      public Vertex(String name, int number_of_larvae, double prep_x, double prep_y)
      The constructor for the Vertex class. It initializes the vertex with a name, number of larvae, and location (prep_x, prep_y). It also initializes the lists of red ants, blue ants, and neighbors.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the vertex.
      number_of_larvae - The number of larvae at the vertex.
      prep_x - The preprocessed x-coordinate of the vertex's location.
      prep_y - The preprocessed y-coordinate of the vertex's location.

  • Method Details

    • lookForRedEnemy

      public RedAnt lookForRedEnemy()
      This method looks for a red enemy at the vertex. If there are no red ants at the vertex, it returns null. Otherwise, it returns the first red ant in the list.
      Returns:
      The first red ant in the list, or null if there are no red ants.

    • lookForBlueEnemy

      public BlueAnt lookForBlueEnemy()
      This method looks for a blue enemy at the vertex. If there are no blue ants at the vertex, it returns null. Otherwise, it returns the first blue ant in the list.
      Returns:
      The first blue ant in the list, or null if there are no blue ants.

    • calculate_x

      public void calculate_x(JPanel panel)
      This method calculates the x-coordinate of the vertex based on the size of the panel.
      Parameters:
      panel - The panel in which the vertex is located.
